channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Camel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Camel

item.title: CVE-2019-0194|2024-08-04T17:44:14.728Z -- apache -- apache%20camel
item.description: Apache Camel's File is vulnerable to directory traversal. Camel 2.21.0 to 2.21.3, 2.22.0 to 2.22.2, 2.23.0 and the unsupported Camel 2.x (2.19 and earlier) versions may be also affected.

item.title: CVE-2019-0188|2024-08-04T17:44:14.864Z -- apache -- apache%20camel
item.description: Apache Camel prior to 2.24.0 contains an XML external entity injection (XXE) vulnerability (CWE-611) due to using an outdated vulnerable JSON-lib library. This affects only the camel-xmljson component, which was removed.
